claim: In the 2016 season, Piast Gliwice had the lowest number of home defeats among all teams.
extra_info: home team lost the matches refers to SUBTRACT(home_team_goal, away_team_goal) < 0; 2016 season refers to season = '2015/2016';
reasoning: In the 2015/2016 season, Piast Gliwice had 1 home defeat. However, three teams (Borussia Dortmund, Napoli, RSC Anderlecht) had 0 home defeats, meaning Piast Gliwice did NOT have the lowest number of home defeats among all teams.

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Team" (
	`id`	INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
	`team_api_id`	INTEGER UNIQUE,
	`team_fifa_api_id`	INTEGER,
	`team_long_name`	TEXT,
	`team_short_name`	TEXT
);

content.text: Now let me query for home defeats per team in the 2015/2016 season:

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT T.team_long_name, COUNT(*) as home_defeats
FROM Match M
JOIN Team T ON M.home_team_api_id = T.team_api_id
WHERE M.season = '2015/2016'
  AND M.home_team_goal < M.away_team_goal
GROUP BY T.team_long_name
ORDER BY home_defeats ASC
LIMIT 20;
"
input.description: Count home defeats per team in 2015/2016 season

content.text: Piast Gliwice has 1 home defeat, but they are tied with many other teams (Ajax, Atlético Madrid, Celtic, etc.) all having 1 home defeat. The claim says Piast Gliwice had "the lowest number" — they do have the lowest count (1), but they are not uniquely the lowest. Let me verify there are no teams with 0 home defeats:

input.command:
sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/european_football_2.sqlite" "
SELECT T.team_long_name, 
  SUM(CASE WHEN M.home_team_goal < M.away_team_goal THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as home_defeats
FROM Match M
JOIN Team T ON M.home_team_api_id = T.team_api_id
WHERE M.season = '2015/2016'
GROUP BY T.team_long_name
ORDER BY home_defeats ASC
LIMIT 20;
"

This is very clear. There are teams with **0 home defeats** (Borussia Dortmund, Napoli, RSC Anderlecht) in the 2015/2016 season. Piast Gliwice had **1 home defeat**, which is not the lowest. The claim is contradicted.
